statements: UPDATE sentencing_disparities SET sentence_duration = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sentencing_disparities SET judge_name = 'Judge Smith', court_location = 'City Court' WHERE defendant_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE sentencing_disparities SET sentence_duration = 60, judge_name = 'Judge Smith' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE sentencing_disparities SET court_location = 'New York City', offense = 'Burglary', sentence_duration = 120 WHERE id = 2
UPDATE SentencingDisparities SET offense_severity='High' WHERE sentencing_id=1;
UPDATE JusticeSystemReform SET reform_description='Implemented new policies' WHERE reform_id=2;
UPDATE SentencingDisparities SET offense_type = 'Drug Trafficking', sentence_length = 10 WHERE sentencing_id = 1;
UPDATE JusticeSystemReform SET reform_description = 'Increased transparency and accountability in the justice system', reform_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE reform_id = 3;
UPDATE SentencingDisparities SET sentence_length = 10 WHERE case_id = 12345;
UPDATE SentencingHistory SET prior_sentencing_history = 'Updated information' WHERE case_id = 54321;
UPDATE SentencingDisparities SET sentence_length = 20 WHERE case_id = 101
UPDATE SentencingHistory SET prior_sentencing_history = 'Previous convictions include theft and assault' WHERE case_id = 201
UPDATE sentences SET crime_type='Robbery' WHERE sentence_id=1;
UPDATE defendants SET age=35, gender='Male' WHERE defendant_id=2;
UPDATE sentences SET crime_type = 'Burglary', sentence_length = 10 WHERE sentence_id = 1;
UPDATE defendants SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE name = 'Alice';
UPDATE judges SET court_name = 'District Court' WHERE judge_id = 1;
UPDATE defendants SET age = 35, race = 'White' WHERE defendant_id = 2;
UPDATE judges SET court_name='Supreme Court' WHERE judge_name='Justice Smith';
UPDATE sentences SET start_date='2022-01-01', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE judge_id=5 AND verdict='Guilty';
